structure.unit: C STATE AID TO LOCAL EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT PROGRAMS

law.text: Supplementary state funds appropriated to the division shall be allocated by the division to local emergency management agencies on a reimbursement basis in amounts not to exceed fifty percent (50%) of the total local funds expended by the local agencies in any given year for the institution, administration, or support of the comprehensive emergency management programs of the city, county, urban-county government or charter county government.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 41, effective July 15, 1998.
